item.title: Here’s a proposal to fix Social Security that we could enact today
item.description: A mix of tolerable benefit cuts and realistic revenue increases would make everyone better off

item.title: Why ditching the penny may not cost Americans much
item.description: Rounding prices to the nearest nickel would not have “any significant inflationary consequences,” a 2023 study found.
